        void setNinePatchBG​(boolean ninePatchBG)
        Set whether this layout should use a medium nine patch as its background This is the same background used for text widgets
        Parameters:
        ninePatchBG - True to enable nine patch background

        Parameters:

        toAlpha - End alpha value (0 - 255)
